    • Method Detail

      • supportsMixedMimeTypeAdaptation

        public final int supportsMixedMimeTypeAdaptation()
        Description copied from interface: com.google.android.exoplayer2.RendererCapabilities
        Returns the extent to which the Renderer supports adapting between supported formats that have different mime types.
        Specified by:
        supportsMixedMimeTypeAdaptation in interface com.google.android.exoplayer2.RendererCapabilities
        Overrides:
        supportsMixedMimeTypeAdaptation in class com.google.android.exoplayer2.BaseRenderer
        Returns:
        The extent to which the renderer supports adapting between supported formats that have different mime types. One of RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_SEAMLESS, RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_NOT_SEAMLESS and RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_NOT_SUPPORTED.

      • supportsFormat

        public final int supportsFormat(com.google.android.exoplayer2.Format format)
        Description copied from interface: com.google.android.exoplayer2.RendererCapabilities
        Returns the extent to which the Renderer supports a given format. The returned value is the bitwise OR of three properties:
        • The level of support for the format itself. One of RendererCapabilities.FORMAT_HANDLED, RendererCapabilities.FORMAT_EXCEEDS_CAPABILITIES, RendererCapabilities.FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED_SUBTYPE and RendererCapabilities.FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE.
        • The level of support for adapting from the format to another format of the same mime type. One of RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_SEAMLESS, RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_NOT_SEAMLESS and RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_NOT_SUPPORTED.
        • The level of support for tunneling. One of RendererCapabilities.TUNNELING_SUPPORTED and RendererCapabilities.TUNNELING_NOT_SUPPORTED.
        The individual properties can be retrieved by performing a bitwise AND with RendererCapabilities.FORMAT_SUPPORT_MASK, RendererCapabilities.ADAPTIVE_SUPPORT_MASK and RendererCapabilities.TUNNELING_SUPPORT_MASK respectively.
        Parameters:
        format - The format.
        Returns:
        The extent to which the renderer is capable of supporting the given format.

      • onPositionReset

        protected void onPositionReset(long positionUs,
                               boolean joining)
        Description copied from class: com.google.android.exoplayer2.BaseRenderer
        Called when the position is reset. This occurs when the renderer is enabled after BaseRenderer.onStreamChanged(Format[]) has been called, and also when a position discontinuity is encountered.

        After a position reset, the renderer's SampleStream is guaranteed to provide samples starting from a key frame.

        The default implementation is a no-op.

        Overrides:
        onPositionReset in class GeckoHlsRendererBase
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The new playback position in microseconds.
        joining - Whether this renderer is being enabled to join an ongoing playback.

      • onStreamChanged

        protected void onStreamChanged(com.google.android.exoplayer2.Format[] formats)
        Description copied from class: com.google.android.exoplayer2.BaseRenderer
        Called when the renderer's stream has changed. This occurs when the renderer is enabled after BaseRenderer.onEnabled(boolean) has been called, and also when the stream has been replaced whilst the renderer is enabled or started.

        The default implementation is a no-op.

        Overrides:
        onStreamChanged in class com.google.android.exoplayer2.BaseRenderer
        Parameters:
        formats - The enabled formats.
